network_overview: The capture contains 20 VoLTE/VoNR SIP sessions, all of which failed—7 cancelled by the user and 13 timed-out during setup. No RTP or bearer-plane traffic is present, indicating that media resources were never successfully allocated.

observations.finding: 100 % call-failure rate; 33 INVITEs sent, zero 200 OK (INVITE) replies, 13 sessions terminated with BYE carrying PS→CS hand-over or internal-reason headers.
No RTP flows detected; media bearer was never established, so voice service is completely unavailable for subscribers in this trace period.
Post-183/PRACK/UPDATE message pairs complete normally, but final 200 OK (INVITE) is missing; average setup delay until timeout ≈ 36 s (Tx:pkt_1 → Tx:pkt_45).

root_causes.description: After successful early-dialog (183/PRACK/UPDATE) the terminating side never returns a final 200 OK for INVITE; timers T9/TB fire and the calling UE cancels. This points to a downstream IMS element (S-CSCF, MGW, or MRF) unable to allocate bearer or awaiting unsuccessful H.248/SDP negotiation.
root_causes.impact: All voice calls fail; subscribers cannot originate or receive voice service.

root_causes.description: No RTP/RTCP packets and no GTP Create-Bearer or PFCP Session-Establishment requests appear, indicating that the PCRF/MME/UPF path never authorised QoS bearer 1 (QCI=1).
root_causes.impact: Even if 200 OK were sent, bearer for voice would be absent, causing one-way or no audio.

recommendations.action: Check S-CSCF logs for 408/504 timeouts or 580 Precondition-Failure when forwarding INVITE to MGW/MRF; verify H.248 context creation and SDP answer generation.
recommendations.rationale: Early-dialog succeeds, so failure lies in the terminating segment or media resource allocation.

recommendations.action: Validate PCRF policy: ensure Rx AAR is triggered after 183 and returns successful AAA with QCI=1, 5-tuple, and guaranteed-bit-rate.
recommendations.rationale: Bearer authorisation must precede the 200 OK (INVITE); absence of GTP/PFCP indicates PCRF/PCF never signalled PGW/UPF.

recommendations.action: Inspect MME/AMF traces for E-RAB Setup/PDU Session Modification failures; correlate with SIP time-stamps to detect radio or transport-layer rejections.
recommendations.rationale: Radio bearers may be rejected due to lack of codec licence, transport resources, or mis-aligned QoS.

recommendations.action: Enable SIP option-tag 'timer' and reduce session-timer to 1800 s; configure MGW to insert 'a=sendrecv' immediately in 183 to shorten negotiation.
recommendations.rationale: Shortens failed call hanging time and reduces signalling load during mass failure.

session_analysis.signaling_health: SIP over SCTP transport is stable (no retransmissions), but call-state machine stalls at 'Proceeding'—no 200 OK (INVITE) delivered.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U or RTP detected; user-plane bearers are never established.
session_analysis.voice_quality: Voice service unavailable; no RTP means no MOS, packet-loss, or jitter metrics.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Successful SIP early-dialog without corresponding bearer-setup messages proves that IMS layer is ahead of packet-core layer; packet-core never fulfils the QoS request.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant UE as 'UE (IPv6)'
    participant P as 'P-CSCF'
    participant S as 'S-CSCF/MGW'
    UE->>P: INVITE (SDP offer)
    P->>S: INVITE
    S-->>P: 100 Trying
    P-->>UE: 100 Trying
    S-->>P: 183 Session Progress (SDP answer)
    P-->>UE: 183 Session Progress
    UE->>P: PRACK
    P->>S: PRACK
    S-->>P: 200 OK (PRACK)
    P-->>UE: 200 OK (PRACK)
    UE->>P: UPDATE
    P->>S: UPDATE
    S-->>P: 200 OK (UPDATE)
    P-->>UE: 200 OK (UPDATE)
    Note over S: No 200 OK (INVITE) sent
    UE->>P: CANCEL (Timer expires ~36 s)
    P->>S: CANCEL
    S-->>P: 200 OK (CANCEL)
    S-->>P: 487 Request Terminated
    P-->>UE: 487 Request Terminated
    UE->>P: ACK
    P->>S: ACK
